attributes.title: 2022 Isuzu D-Max 1.9 DDI HR Single-Cab

attributes.description:
Pearl White with Black leather, Full service history at agents (Last service done less than a 100 km ago), Active xenon headlights with washers and LED daytime driving lights, Front and rear park distance control with graphic assist rear view camera, 90 percent left on tyres, Color codded rims, Thule removable roof rails, Keyless entry, Factory fitted running boards, 360 Degree all around view cameras, Extra row seats, Split tailgate, Light and rain sensors, Tow bar, Factory fitted long range fuel tanks, Multifunction steering, Electric windows,mirrors,seats and steering, Heated and cooling front seats, Centre console fridge, Rock crawl mode settings, 4 High and low range with diff locks, Keyless stop/start, Power steering, ABS Brakes, Turn assist function with active crawl control, SRS Airbags, Dual battery system, Factory fitted steering operated voice command touch screen radio with front loader CD, USB and auxiliary input, Touch screen operated front and rear climate control, Sunglass holder, Anti skid control, Auxiliary power points, Memory drivers seat, Full Land Cruiser carpets, Power heated windscreen, Voice activated touch screen SAT/NAV, Auto dim mirror, Steering operated touch screen on board computer, Touch screen maintenance display, iPod connect, Roll sensing curtain airbags mode, Traffic info, Hill down decent, Cup holders, Key operated central locking with alarm/immobilizer.

CONTACT DETAILS:
Phone Cape SUV : 021 982 0334
Niel : 081 408 9188
Martin : 072 246 1367
Visit our website on www.capesuv.co.za

Please confirm dealerships banking details before making a payment to avoid extensive email fraud.
2 Year optional warranty available.
Trade ins welcome.
We are an authorized financial service provider.
This is an authentic advertisement with a reputable dealer. Please be aware of scams by fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay over any deposits unless you have confirmed the details of the vehicle directly with the dealer.
Please note: While every care is taken to avoid mistakes, the dealer cannot accept liability for any errors, misprints or omissions in the printing of an advertisement. Please confirm all facts and features, i.e. leather trim etc with the dealer before making a purchase.
